TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProxyWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart
Public MustInherit Class ProxyWebPart Inherits WebPart

Docs.summary: Represents the base class for Web Parts controls that under certain conditions must replace other Web Parts controls on a page.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> 如是一组 Web 部件控件的基类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>，该页面上的其他 Web 部件控件的可作为占位符。 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>发生某种类型的错误或失败时，控件将替换为另一个 Web 部件控件。 例如，当用户无权查看页上的 Web 部件控件，则的目标 Web 部件控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>控件。 原始的 Web 部件控件时无法加载 Web 部件控件或不能创建它的新实例，将替换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控件。 如果 Web 部件控件更高版本的预期变得可供用户使用，将还原到页和对象派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>类将被删除。
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>类不会保存视图状态或控件的状态。 如果 Web 部件控件被替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象和更高版本变为可用，其视图状态和控件状态将为空。
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象保留的个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件所替换它。 如果原始的 Web 部件控件可用时，将还原其个性化设置数据。
当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件保存的个性化设置数据，不会保存的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象。 相反，它将保存控件的属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>替换对象。 如果原始的 Web 部件控件变为可用，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件将自动加载它。
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>对象包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象。 可以从检索 Web 部件控件所需的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A>属性。
如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象替换是提供程序或 Web 部件连接中的使用者的 Web 部件控件，该连接未激活，但不是会被删除。 如果原始的 Web 部件控件可用时，该连接将重新激活。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ProxyWebPart (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

new System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart

Docs.param: The Web Parts control to be replaced.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class when a static Web Parts control (or server or user control) must be replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于创建代理 Web 部件控件来替换静态 Web 部件控件。 若要替换动态创建的 Web 部件控件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>构造函数来创建代理 Web 部件控件。

Docs.exception: has an empty property \- or - is an empty \- or - is of type and its child control has an empty property

MemberSignature.Value: protected ProxyWebPart (string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID) cil managed
Protected Sub New (originalID As String, originalTypeName As String, originalPath As String, genericWebPartID As String)
protected: ProxyWebPart(System::String ^ originalID, System::String ^ originalTypeName, System::String ^ originalPath, System::String ^ genericWebPartID);
new System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart : string * string * string * string -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart

Docs.param: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the control to replace. If a control is replaced, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
A string that is the name of the of the control to replace. If a control is replaced, the type name is the type of its child server control.
A string that contains the path to the user control to replace.
A string that returns the ID of a control, if that type of control is being replaced. This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the base class.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class when a dynamic Web Parts control must be replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于创建代理 Web 部件控件来替换动态 Web 部件控件。 若要替换静态 Web 部件控件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29>构造函数来创建代理 Web 部件控件。

Docs.exception: is specified but is or an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象将包含相同的值在其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.ID%2A>属性作为它所替换的控件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象将 Web 部件控件，替换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>属性包含<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>的被替换的控件。 如果被替换的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象，此属性包含来自 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。
